title: Chain of History: Learning and Forecasting with LLMs for Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion. (arXiv:2401.06072v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion (TKGC) is a challenging task of predicting missing event links at future timestamps by leveraging established temporal structural knowledge. Given the formidable generative capabilities inherent in LLMs (LLMs), this paper proposes a novel approach to conceptualize temporal link prediction as an event generation task within the context of a historical event chain. We employ efficient fine-tuning methods to make LLMs adapt to specific graph textual information and patterns discovered in temporal timelines. Furthermore, we introduce structure-based historical data augmentation and the integration of reverse knowledge to emphasize LLMs' awareness of structural information, thereby enhancing their reasoning capabilities. We conduct thorough experiments on multiple widely used datasets and find that our fine-tuned model outperforms existing embedding-based models on multiple metrics, achieving SOTA results. We also carry out sufficient ablation experiments

translated_title: 历史链的链路预测与学习：基于LLMs的时间知识图补全
translated_abstract: 时间知识图补全是一项具有挑战性的任务，其通过利用已建立的时间结构知识来预测未来时间戳上缺失的事件链接。本文提出了一种新颖的方法，将时间链路预测概念化为历史事件链中的事件生成任务，利用LLMs的强大生成能力。我们采用高效的微调方法，使LLMs适应特定的图文信息和在时间线中发现的模式。此外，我们引入基于结构的历史数据增强和反向知识的整合，以增强LLMs对结构信息的意识，从而提高其推理能力。我们在多个广泛使用的数据集上进行了详尽的实验，发现我们微调的模型在多个指标上优于现有的基于嵌入的模型，取得了SOTA的结果。我们还进行了充分的消融实验。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于LLMs的新方法，将时间知识图补全任务概念化为历史事件链中的事件生成任务。通过引入高效的微调方法和结构化历史数据增强，以及整合反向知识，我们的模型在多个指标上优于现有的方法，取得了SOTA结果。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel approach to temporal knowledge graph completion by conceptualizing it as an event generation task within a historical event chain. By leveraging LLMs and introducing efficient fine-tuning methods, structure-based historical data augmentation, and integration of reverse knowledge, the proposed model outperforms existing methods, achieving state-of-the-art results.
